thread.section_title: ezCater Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ezCater | www.ezcater.com
thread.title: Melody Parham

author: Melody Parham
title: Melody Parham
text: Providing support for a busy Executive, and managing the office for a staff of 100 is quite a challenge. As someone that has to order for business meetings and large functions, I've come to depend on ezCater. Just today, on a Sunday, I was able to place a lunch order for 70 tomorrow. ezCater confirmed the order with the vendor and eased my worries!! I have recommended them in the past, and will continue to do so! PLEASE keep up the great service, and I'll be a lifelong customer!!
